definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
calf (back of the leg below the knee)
"Pregnancy-oriented Economy", new market conditions brought about by a predicted baby boom in China
lit. to swallow one's knocked-out teeth after getting punched in the face (idiom)/fig. to endure bullying or insults stoically
pinyin: da3 diao4 men2 ya2 , wang3 du4 zi5 li3 yan4
ba3 xin1 fang4 zai4 du4 zi5 li3

definition: see 羊肚手巾[yang2 du4 shou3 jin1]
see 羊肚手巾[yang2 du4 shou3 jin1]

sentences.english: It was only a tummy ache.
But he is proud to show off the scars and stitch-marks that cover his belly.
sentences.chinese: 但他卻很樂意炫耀自己肚子上的刀疤和縫合的印記。

sentences.english: Little red hat hurried to put a big stone into the wolf's belly.
sentences.chinese: 小紅帽趕快去找來大石頭填到狼的肚子裏去。

sentences.english: Chen Jiaying is Laojiang Hu that she would take hasty to Faye Wong in the stomach joke?
sentences.chinese: 陳家瑛是老江湖，她會草率到拿王菲的肚子開玩笑嗎？

sentences.english: Needless to say, he had a stomach fire in Fu Youli.
sentences.chinese: 不用說，他這一肚子的火又發在了傅由理身上。

sentences.english: She clutched Pat’s painting to her stomach.
sentences.chinese: 她將帕特的油畫捧在肚子上。

sentences.english: You hang your wedding ring over your belly and it moves in circles
sentences.chinese: 把你的戒指吊在肚子上方，戒指繞圈圈。

sentences.english: The aby must be born soon. The mother's belly can't keep on stretching.
sentences.chinese: 孩子馬上就要出生了，媽媽的肚子不能再撐大了。

sentences.english: Is menstruation have loose bowels normal phenomenon?
sentences.chinese: 月經期間拉肚子是正常現象嗎？

sentences.english: We pigged out on potato chips and cookies until our bellies ached.
sentences.chinese: 大喫薯條和曲奇，喫到肚子撐到痛爲止。

sentences.english: He shows me the 6-inch scar on his belly.
sentences.chinese: 他還給我看了肚子上6英寸的疤。

sentences.english: Tom humped himself with two hands pressing his stomach.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆弓着身子，雙手捂着肚子。

sentences.english: Why I often upset stomach, still vomit.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我經常肚子痛，還嘔吐。

sentences.english: After the exam, the OB- GYN told her that she was pregnant, and in great shape.
sentences.chinese: 體檢完後，婦產科醫生說她懷孕了，並且肚子已大。

sentences.english: Wait until a mosquito imbibe enough blood then punch a hole on its stomach by a needle.
sentences.chinese: 期望一隻蚊子吸飽了血，在它肚子上用針扎一個洞。

sentences.english: God I'm hungry. I only had a dingo's breakfast this morning.
sentences.chinese: 天啊，我肚子好餓，我晃了一個早上，都還沒喫早餐。

definition: sound made by an empty stomach
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
